Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:04:34 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

Samsung Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active

Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra 5G, Note 20 5G, Note 10 Plus 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8

Samsung Galaxy A02s, A03s, A03, A3, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, A10, A10E, A11, A12

Samsung Galaxy A20, A21, A21s, A22, A31, A32, A40, A41, A42, A50, A51, A52, A53, A60, A70, A70s, A71 5G, A72, A80, A90

Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2/ Z Fold 3/ Z Fold 4/ Z Flip/ Z Flip 3/ Z Flip 4/ F52

Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0(2018), Tab A 10.1 (2019), Tab 10.5, Tab A 8.0

Google Pixel, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel XL

LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus

One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p

Other USB Type C Device

INPUT:

100 – 240 VAC ; 50-60HZ 0.50A

OUTPUT

9V/1.67A ; 5V/2.00A

What is Adaptive Fast Charging

This technology allows the smartphone to be charged with a faster speed, battery can charge faster up to 75% .

Will this product charge other Android phones quickly?

Yes. As long as your device supports Quick Charge QC2.0 & QC3.0, our wall charger block with Type-C cable will charge your device at a fast manner.

What is the difference between Quick Charge (QC) and Adaptive Fast charging (ADC)?

They are basically the same technology but brands marketed in different name. While Qualcomm named it Quick Charge, Samsung named it Adaptive Fast Charging.

Safe Fast Charger & Sync

Fast charger delivers up to output current of 15W, 75% faster than standard chargers, it also has the sync feature, most importantly, it is made for safe charging, it can intelligently recognize the battery type and status, will automatically stop charging when fully charged to prevent from short circuit, over-current, over-voltage, over-heating and over-charging.

Perfect for Any Occasions

These fasting charging kit is great for home, office, restaurant, tour, hotel etc.

High Quality ABS Material

Made of ABS material for the charger shell, shockproof and protect from over-heating & short-circuit

Easy to Carry

Compact classic design is portable to carry anywhere, slim and lightweight

【Quick Charge 3.0 Rapid Charging】Adaptive type c fast charger, enables your battery from zero to 50% in just 30 minutes, 75% faster than standard chargers.
【Fast & Sync】 USB c cell phone wall charger kit charges Samsung phones and tablets with USB 2. 0 ports at max high speed of 480 Mbps. It also charge USB-C devices without the Fast Charging feature as well, with up to a 2 Amp charging rate. Besides, it also has data transfer feature for convenient usage.
【Wide Compatibility】Compatible AFC (Adaptive Fast Charging): Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, S21 Plus, S21, S20 Ultra, S20 Plus, S20, S20 FE, S10, S10e, S10+, S9, S9+, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active, Galaxy Note 20 Ultra , Note 20 5G, Note 10+ 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8, Galaxy A90, A80, A71 5G, A70s, A52, A51, A20, Galaxy Z Fold2, Z Fold2 5G, Z Flip, Z Flip 5G, Fold, GOOGLE Pixel 1, 2, 3, 6, Pixel XL, LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus, One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p and other USB Type C Device
【Package List】Replace or refund within one year without return, lifetime technical support. Package included: 2x Wall Charger Plug Box Brick and 2x Type-C [ 6 Feet ] Cord.

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

Samsung Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active

Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra 5G, Note 20 5G, Note 10 Plus 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8

Samsung Galaxy A02s, A03s, A03, A3, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, A10, A10E, A11, A12

Samsung Galaxy A20, A21, A21s, A22, A31, A32, A40, A41, A42, A50, A51, A52, A53, A60, A70, A70s, A71 5G, A72, A80, A90

Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2/ Z Fold 3/ Z Fold 4/ Z Flip/ Z Flip 3/ Z Flip 4/ F52

Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0(2018), Tab A 10.1 (2019), Tab 10.5, Tab A 8.0

Google Pixel, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel XL

LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus

One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p

Other USB Type C Device

INPUT:

100 – 240 VAC ; 50-60HZ 0.50A

OUTPUT

9V/1.67A ; 5V/2.00A

What is Adaptive Fast Charging

This technology allows the smartphone to be charged with a faster speed, battery can charge faster up to 75% .

Will this product charge other Android phones quickly?

Yes. As long as your device supports Quick Charge QC2.0 & QC3.0, our wall charger block with Type-C cable will charge your device at a fast manner.

What is the difference between Quick Charge (QC) and Adaptive Fast charging (ADC)?

They are basically the same technology but brands marketed in different name. While Qualcomm named it Quick Charge, Samsung named it Adaptive Fast Charging.

Safe Fast Charger & Sync

Fast charger delivers up to output current of 15W, 75% faster than standard chargers, it also has the sync feature, most importantly, it is made for safe charging, it can intelligently recognize the battery type and status, will automatically stop charging when fully charged to prevent from short circuit, over-current, over-voltage, over-heating and over-charging.

#8 in Cell Phone Mounts
#26 in Cell Phone Automobile Cradles
OS Windows Phone, IOS, Android
Special Features Travel, Fit Big Phones, Ultra Stable, Fit Both Vertical or Horizontal Vents, One Hand Operation, Innovative Quick Release, 360° Rotation Car Phone Mount
Colour Black
Included Components 1 * Phone Cradle for Universal Phones & Cases, 1 * User Manual, Lifetime Service & Free Replacement, 1 * Alternative Car Vent Clip for hot summer day
Manufacturer andobil
Country of Origin China
Date First Available May 23, 2020

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99 - $19.59
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:14:55 UTC – Details)

From the brand

In the spring of 2018, with enthusiasm for digital products, a group of young people came together and found Andobil to help others enjoy Tech better.Staying curious and creative, we are always determined to combine minimalism with aesthetics to create products.Helping customers to enjoy the ultimate tech is our eternal pursuit.

【Phone’s Safe Like in an Infant Seat】This car phone holder with anti-scratched plate and soft rubber side pad design give your iPhone 13 iPhone 12 11 or Samsung 100% protection, makes your cell phones always sleep like a baby in the vent phone mount when driving. Secure air-bag design of this phone holder for car vent leaves zero scratches on your mobile phone even on bumpy roads.
【0.1s Quick Release One Hand Operation】 andobil car phone holder. More convenient and easier operation with new “Quick Release” button, comparing with other “One-hand operation” car phone mount, Andobil phone holder for car vent brings you brand new 0.1s-releasing experience. What’s more, the andobil car phone holder can withstand 300,000+ times open & close by repeated tests in Andobil laboratory.
【360° Flexible Rotation as Wish】 Best viewing angle when driving with this air vent car phone mount, it is designed with a 360° swivel ball joint, you can adjust your phone with a single hand for a horizontal, vertical, or more layout for navigating, phone talking, music listening, etc. Optimizing the perfect angle & position and offering safe driving experience.
【Wide Compatible with All Smartphones】 This andobil car cell phone holder is compatible with all cell phones from 4″ to 7″, the specially designed adjustable foot can be adjusted for different sizes and shapes, perfect for Apple iPhone 13 pro max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 pro max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 11, X, XR, SE, 7, 6, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, S10, Note 10, Moto G, Google Pixel, Huawei P30, Nokia, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Sony, LG, etc.
【Andobil Car Phone Holder Service】 Andobil is professional in designing and always making the best car phone holder for all the car drivers, including Uber, Lyft, Truck drivers, etc. what’s more, we will provide 2-year support. If you meet any questions or hesitations before purchasing or when using, please let us know, we would like to hear your voice and solve them for you in 12 hours.


Compatible with All Cellphones in 4”-7” size:

iPhone Series Compatible with iPhone 13 Pro Max, 13 Pro, 13, 12 Pro,12,12 Mini, iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, 8 Plus, 8, X, XS max, XS, XR, 7 Plus, 7, etc.
Samsung Series Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S22, S21 Ultra, S20, S10, S9, S8, S7 Edge, Note 20, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8, etc.
LG Series Compatible with LG G8, G7 ThinQ, G6+, V50, V40 ThinQ, V30, Stylo 4, Optimus, etc.
Google Series Compatible with Google Pixel 4, 4XL, 3, 3XL, 2, 2XL, XL, Nexus 6P, 6, 7, 5X, etc.
Huawei Series Compatible with Huawei Mate 40, Mate 30 Pro, Mate 20, P40, P30, P20, etc
Oneplus Series Compatible with Oneplus 7 Pro, 6T, 6, 5T, 5, X, etc.
Other Cellphone Series Compatible with Moto G7, Z3, Nokia 7.1/ 6.1, etc.

4.5

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Price: $69.99 - $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:30:48 UTC – Details)


Amazfit Bip 3 pro–the 2022 upgraded smartwatch that guides you toward a healthier, more active, more connected life. The watch packs a 1.69″ super-sized color screen into its super slim and light body for a clear, exquisite viewing experience. It adds 4 Satellite Positioning Systems to provide faster, more accurate positioning. Powerful battery to deliver up to 14 days of battery life. Built-in 60+ sports modes and Target Pace function, making your exercise at a higher level. With a powerful Water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip 3 Pro without worry. Get clear and actionable insights into your health with SpO2 measurement, 24/7 heart rate monitoring, sleep analysis, stress detection, and menstrual cycle tracking. Compatible with Android 7.0 and above & IOS 12.0 and above device.
【Big on Screen, Big on Style】Immerse yourself in the 1.69″ super-large and colorful HD display, and see all your incoming text and calls in awesome, expansive quality. Express more of yourself with 50 plus watch faces and editable watch faces & widgets – or customize with your own photos..Water resistance depth:50 meters
【Explore a Big Open World】The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro smart watch supports 4 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves through the great outdoors with high precision.
【Big on Power】Got a trip coming up? Unplug yourself for up to two weeks with typical usage. The Bip 3 Pro smartwatch packs a powerful battery into its super slim and light body, so you can pack something more fun than a charger into your case.
【Big on Health】It’s the ultimate device for a healthier, more active life that can provide blood-oxygen saturation measurement, monitoring of heart rate all day & abnormal heart rate warnings, stress levels & sleep tracking, as well as recording female menstrual period.
【Smash Bigger Workout Goals】The Bip 3 Pro fitness watch has 60 plus sports modes, allowing you to get data for all your favorite sports, like walking, running and cycling, as well as more freeform workouts like strength training, yoga, and free training.
【Take a Deep Dip with Bip】IP68 drowning your ambition? With its water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip 3 Pro without worry. The watch can even track your activity data with its Open Water Swimming sports mode.



Big on Action




4satellite positioning systems

The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro supports 4 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves through the great outdoors with high-precision.

60+ Sports Modes

Get data for all your favorite sports, like indoor and outdoor walking, running and cycling, as well as more freeform workouts like strength training, yoga, and free training. Take your cardio game to the next level with the watch’s Target Pace function, which lets you set and crush your pace goals.

5 ATM water-Resistance

IP68 drowning your ambition? With its water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip3 Pro, without worry. The watch can even track your activity data with its Open Water Swimming sports mode.

Read more

Big on Health




Go Higher with SpO2 Measurement

Feeling worn out? Or adventuring up to higher altitudes? Be smart and use the watch to easily measure your blood-oxygen saturation in as quick as 25 seconds, to quickly understand your physical state.

Follow Your Heart All Day

Keep an eye on the most important muscle in your body. The watch can monitor your heart rate all day, and let you know if it becomes abnormally elevated. You can even check if you’re working out in your goal heart rate zone.

Dream Big, Dream Bip

Follow your dreams through the light, deep and REM sleep stages. The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro can monitor your sleep quality8, so you can rest well enough to keep making the fitness gains you want.

  • Monitor Sleep Stages & Daytime Naps
  • Track Sleep Breathing Quality
  • Get a Sleep Score in the Zepp App

Read more

Big on Versatility




Express More of Yourself

Immerse yourself in the super-large and colorful HD display and express more of yourself with 50+ watch faces and editable watch faces & widgets – or customize with your own photos.

A Smart Partner for Your Phone

Synchronize it with your phone get SMS/phone call/app notifications and control the music playback/ camera of your phone, right on your wrist. The smart watch will also offer Sedentary Reminders, Do Not Disturb, To-Do List, and weather forecast functions, as well as enabling the setting of alarms and stopwatches.

Connect to the Zepp App

The ZeppApp on your phone conducts health and exercise data display and analysis, features a watch face store, provides system updates for your watch, and facilitates smart device management.

Read more

4.5
Price: $69.99 - $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:30:48 UTC – Details)

var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);

var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

onlineMonth,
currentMonth,

);

Price: $54.99 - $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:20:43 UTC – Details)


The Tile Starter Pack is an easy way to keep track of all the things you can’t live without. Mate is a versatile tracker that easily attaches to everyday must-haves likes keys, backpacks, wallets, and more. It has up to 250 ft Bluetooth range and a 3-year non-replaceable battery. Slim, Tile’s thinnest tracker, easily slides into your wallet, luggage tag, or a book. It has a 200 ft Bluetooth range and 3-year non-replaceable battery. Both Mate and Slim are water-resistant, work with Android and Apple® devices, have voice-assisted finding with Alexa, Google and Siri, and can be used to ring your phone if it ever gets lost.
TRACKER FOR KEYS, WALLETS AND MORE: Get started with our Mate and Slim to help you easily find what you can’t live without like your keys and wallet. Keep track of more for less with our multi-packs or give them to your friends and family as a gift.
FIND NEARBY — Use the Tile app to ring your Tile when it’s within Bluetooth range, or ask your Smart Home device to find it for you.
FIND FAR AWAY — When outside of Bluetooth range, use the Tile app to view your Tile’s most recent location on a map.
FIND YOUR PHONE- Double press the button on your Tile to make your phone ring, even when it’s on silent.
NOTIFY WHEN FOUND — Enlist the secure and anonymous help of the Tile Network to help find your things. If your lost Tile is found, If your Tile is lost, add your contact information so you can be reached when someone scans the QR code on your lost Tile.
ANDROID, IOS & SMART HOME COMPATIBLE – Find your things with the free Tile app on both iOS and Android devices. Tile also works with Amazon Alexa, Hey Google and Siri
TECH SPECS: Water-Resistant (IP67 rated), Up to 3-year non-replaceable battery, Up to 250 ft / 76 m Bluetooth range
UPGRADE TO A PREMIUM PLAN: Get proactive Smart Alert notifications when you leave something behind, and with Item Reimbursement, if we can’t find your Tiled item, we reimburse you.

Broad Vision: Qifutan cell phone car mount features a 16cm/6.2in aluminum long gooseneck that sends your phone much closer to you. It can be mounted on the dashboard or windshield firmly. Most importantly, you can bend it in every direction to avoid obstructing the view
Secure Steady Installation: Qifutan car mount for iphone 13/12/11 features an extra-strong vacuum suction cup with a layer of super sticky gel, a locking lever, and an anti-shake stabilizer. It sticks securely and easily on the dashboard or most flat surfaces and removes the phone car mount without leaving any nasty marks. (Note: use warm water to wash the car holder’s suction cup if the surface is dirty or it can not stick firmly, then let it air dry.)
One-Hand Operation: Press the button on the lower back of the car mobile phone holder to take out your phone, and press the back edge of the clamping arms to secure your phone with one hand. Make your operation more fluently. Fit well for the smartphone which’s the width between 4”-7”in and the most thickness
Smooth Contact: The car phone mount is padded with multiple soft silicone pads to avoid scratching your smartphone or other devices. Perfect choice for most cars, vehicle, pickup trucks, SUVs, trucks, taxis; a good assistant for Uber, Lyft drivers
Ideal Viewing Angle: The car phone mount features a 360° rotating ball joint that allows you to switch it from portrait to landscape view quickly, for getting the best viewing angle. item.content:encoded:
Price: $99.90 - $79.90
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:24:05 UTC – Details)



More Screen, Less Bezel: The A10L’s 18:9 aspect ratio makes it ready for the newest app designs, and also offers more screen space while making it easier to grip with one hand.
A+ Photos: The A10L’s back and front cameras are always ready to capture those moments that come up when you’re in the middle of the excitement, or quietly taking in the surroundings. All the essential functions like auto-focusing and ash are there to help your pictures hold that scene exactly as it was.
Android 12 (Go edition): The A10L sports Google’s latest and greatest – Android 11 (Go edition), and in its light and swift Go edition, which offers savings on storage space, Google’s own suite of apps streamlined for Go, and a Play Store which suggests ideal Go-optimized apps from other well-known developers.
Two Phones in One: One of the best features of the A-series is back in the A10L – dual SIM card slots. Enjoy the flexibility of having your primary phone SIM in one slot, and a travel SIM in the other. Or maybe your personal and business numbers together in the same phone. Android 11 (Go edition) allows for granular control over multiple SIMs in the A10L, so they can work together in many combinations.
Level Performance: A quad-core processor, two full gigabytes of RAM, and 16 gigabytes of storage give you the power to take on everything from an online spreadsheet to a combat mission. Better yet, you can expand your storage up to 64 gigabytes more by inserting an SD card.

Product Description

How to connect the Bluetooth smartwatch to make or answer calls on the watch?

You need to download the APP from your phone’s APP store, turn on your bluetooth and open the APP, click “Add A Device” , then find “P42B” to pair it.

Android: After successfully connecting the APP, the mobile phone will automatically pop up “Pair”or”OK” in 5 seconds to request a Bluetooth call. It does not need to be set on the mobile phone separately. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

iPhone: After the APP is successfully bound, you need to open the Phone settings → Bluetooth on the phone, find Bluetooth named “P42B_Phone” in the list, and click “Pair”. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

Wwzzey smart watch is a best choice as an exquisite gift for Birthday, Christmas, Wedding Anniversary, Valentine’s day, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving Day and other special days etc.

Main Functions: Make/Answer calls, Pedometer, Heart rate Monitor, Spo2 Monitor, Sleep Monitor, Workout modes; Alarm Clock; Wake Up Gesture; Remote Camera; 150+ Watch Faces; Time Format; Information Sync; Reminders; Find Device; Sports; Weather; Music Control & Player; AI Voice; Breathe; Exercise; Game; Flashlight, ect.

Stylish Smart Watch for Women and Men

Connect the mobile phone Bluetooth, you can voice control the mobile phone to reply to the message, check the weather, etc.

The AI voice function making it possible to complete tasks without having to grab your phone out of your pocket book.

Camera Remotely

Just open the App on your smart phone and find the shake camera function to take a photo by shaking your smart watch, making it easier to record your happy moments with your friends and family.

Excellent Daily Partner

This fitness tracker watch not only can accurately provide 24/7 Heart Rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring, but also many practical features, such as alarm clocks, weather forecast, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder, helping you have a healthier lifestyle. And it’s a good choice as gift for your friends and family.

A Variety of Sport Modes

Our fitness tracker has 8 sport modes： Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. It can meet your daily exercise needs basically.

Long Battery Life

iOS Android smart watch is equipped with a 235mAh battery, just need to be charged for 1.5 to 2 hours, can be used for 2-3 days bluetooth call. And it Supports 20 days standby time.

【2022 Fashionable Bluetooth Call Smart Watch】Wwzzey smart watch allows you to answer or dial calls anywhere, anytime. 【Multifunctional Health Tracking】This fitness watch can measure your steps, walking distance and burning calories precisely in real time, and can monitor your Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen (SpO2) and your sleep, and help you better understand your health and create a health plan. Moreover, the watch not only has alarm/breathing training/sedentary reminder/drinking water reminder and other functions, but also can control music, control a camera remotely to record your happy moments with friends more easily.
【IP68 Waterproof & 8 Sports Models】Our health tracker is completely dust-proof and waterproof, you can wear it in washing hands, walking in the rain, bathing or swimming and so on, it can meet your daily needs completely. And the fitness tracker also has 8 sport modes : Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. Pick it to track your real-time data during daily fitness and make exercise easier.

6.53” FHD+ Dotch LCD display: Powered by NXTVISION, will upgrade your visual experience with the sharper details, vibrant images and allow you to enjoy true-to-life color accuracy in everything you present.TCL 10L Unlocked Android Smartphone is made for the US with a one-year US warranty.
Superior clarity day & night: Coming with a 48MP high-res AI camera(48MP+8MP+2MP+2MP) and 6MP front-facing selfie camera, TCL 10L android phone helps you capture crisp and vivid pictures. The AI-powered camera recognizes and enhances scenes & objects for your best creations.
Compatible with GSM carriers(AT&T and T-Mobile). TCL 10L mobile phone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
Comfortable viewing all day: Auto-adjusting display provides the best viewing experience regardless of lighting conditions. A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day. Please know that on TCL 10L phone WIFI calling is only compatible with T-Mobile.

Superior Clarity

TCL 10L unlocked android smartphone capture the moment like never before with an AI quad camera system that integrates auto-brightness, super resolution, HDR & more. There are vibrant pixels in every shot, day or night. Experience 3 times more brightness and capture greater detail even in the darkest of settings.

Greater View

With the TCL 10L android phone you can find the beauty in little things with a Macro Camera that captures the rich textures, and tiny details of all your favorite things.

Full-Scene Photos

TCL 10L’s 118° wide-angle camera includes 3.3 times more of the world in a single shot. Gather your friends for a beautiful sunset and take an unforgettable photo or video – with everyone in it. Snap a breathtaking landscape and be able to capture the entirety of the beauty around you.

Imaginative Video

With the TCL 10L, you can set up shortcut keys in an instant. Get maximum control so you will know exactly what’s happening on your screen and what you’re touching, making life more convenient and effortless for you.

Read more

Smart Key for Fast Access

The Smart Key allows you to customize your TCL 10L mobile phone to access any dedicated app or feature with the press of a button. Make your phone as unique as you.

Effortless Unlocking

Never worry about your phone getting into the wrong hands again. With the convenience and security of two forms of authentication (Face Key and a fingerprint sensor), you get safe and fast access to your cell phone. One simple touch or glance will bring you straight to your favorite apps or important messages.

Powerful Audio

Enjoy a seamlessly connected lifestyle by connecting up to four speakers or headphones at once. Bring the party to life and share your favorite playlist on the go with a personalized listening experience.

Talkback Blind Mode

TCL 10L – NXTVISION Display

Optimize your media playback and creative expression with TCL 10L’s NXTVISION visual technology. The quad camera consists of a 48MP high resolution camera, a super wide-angle camera, a macro camera and a depth camera for amazing portraits. Create fun and artistic clips with wide angle and stop motion video modes.

Make life on the go a little easier with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 octa-core processor, and a reliable 4000mAh battery with smart power optimization. Tap-and-go with a customizable interface, Smart Key, Face Key and fingerprint sensor that provide access effortlessly.

Product Description

Smart watch with text and call

Women’s smart watch contains many daily useful tools. For example, Bluetooth calls, smart notifications, breath training, music control, camera control, do not disturb mode, stopwatch, weather, flashlight.

【Call Notifications & Dialing】Smart watches for women includes more practical functions, Fitness Tracker (Pedometer, Calories, Distance), Heart Rate Monitor, Blood Pressure, 8 Sports Modes, Sleep Monitor, Blood Oxygen , Call Notifications & Phone calls, SMS and APP Messages , Music and Camera Control, Brightness Adjustment, Weather Display, Sedentary Reminder, Alarm Clock, Stopwatch.
【 1.72″ HD IPS Screen 】Smart watch for android phones uses 2.5D full-touch 1.72-inch color screen with 240*285 high-definition resolution, which makes every data screen clear and flexible. The ultra-thin frame gives you a more open visual experience. Custom dial design, You can change your favorite picture as a watch face with one click .（Specially equipped with an additional pink silicone strap.）
【Accurate Activity Tracker Watch & 8 Sport Modes】Fitness watch for women compatible with iphone track your steps,calories,heart rate,sleep stages,Blood Pressure,oxygen;smart watch supports 8 sports modes:walking,running,bicycle,swimming ,badminton,basketball,football,rope skipping to give you more detailed insights into your whole day activities; IP68 waterproof, you can wear it when swimming and record various data (Can not wear in hot shower).
【SMART WATCH FOR ANDROID PHONES】Compatible with most iOS 8.0 & Android 5.1 & Bluetooth 4.0 above. Download and install the Free “DA FIT” APP, connecting this womens smart watch in your phone, you can receive notifications of the calendar, incoming calls, SNS (Messenger, WhatsApp, Skype, etc) and preview messages. It will never let you miss any important things( Can not reply message). We offer sincere service within 7 x 24hrs to meet your satisfaction.
【Super Long Battery Life 】Android smart watch for women men equipped with a 200 mAh large capacity battery and can be used 7-15 days If fully charge (depends on individual usage) smart watch with text and call
